title: Database Administrator
description: Tutorials about storing and organize data, include capacity planning, backup and data recovery

title: Data Engineer
description: Videos on design, build, integrate data from various resources, and manage big data

title: Quality Analyst
description: Learn about the principles and practices of software quality assurance throughout the software development life cycle

title: Security Engineer
description: Videos about specialized field of engineering that focuses on the security aspects in the design of systems

title: Software Developer
description: Videos on the design, development and maintenance of software systems

title: Solutions Architect
description: Mapping the business requirements in line with enterprise architectural plan

title: Systems Administrator
description: Maintain the essentials such as operating systems, business applications, both hardware and software

title: UI/UX Designer
description: Illustrating design ideas using storyboards, process flows and sitemaps
